trends: There has been one other sighting in Jay
There were no other sightings in Jay on or around November 27th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthe second or main ufo was seen falling from the sky down to the ground at a moderate pace, and was a bright reddish glow. (you could see the glow of high bright it was from the surrounding trees and brush) and it decended to the ground where i could only see it once in a while after that. also, let it be known that the drone craft above in all the same positions, were still in the same positions and continuing to bounce or dance in unison. make this also known, that this has happened on 2 nights in a row, on or around the same time each night. last night was the second night, as we almost were expecting it again, and all went outside to watch things develop. i can give a detailed report via phone and i'd rather do it that way further if possible. also, i'd like to show you a possible landing zone and path of the descending object, so please call for further information. *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg)
Summary: 2 different craft - one directly above which was 2 spheres dancing in UNISON with each other. (There were several sets of these same dancing sets at what seemed like strategic positions surrounding the area.)
